features.name: Authentication
features.description: Supabase-based authentication with role-based access control (RBAC). Supports roles: ADMIN, MANAGER, OPS_STAFF, WAREHOUSE_STAFF, FINANCE_STAFF, SUPPORT

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with KPIs, charts, and quick actions for logistics operations

features.name: Shipments
features.description: CRUD operations for shipments with AWB generation, status tracking, and customer association

features.name: Manifests
features.description: Manifest creation, shipment assignment, dispatch workflow (OPEN -> CLOSED -> DEPARTED -> ARRIVED)

features.name: Scanning
features.description: Barcode/QR scanning with idempotent shipment-to-manifest assignment. Supports ZXing scanner integration

features.name: Invoices
features.description: Invoice creation, management, PDF generation with barcode. Status workflow: DRAFT -> ISSUED -> PAID/CANCELLED

features.name: Customers
features.description: Customer management with GSTIN, address, and billing information

features.name: Tracking
features.description: Internal and public shipment tracking with event history

features.name: Exceptions
features.description: Exception handling for shipments with assignment, resolution workflow, and severity levels

features.name: Inventory
features.description: Warehouse inventory management and stock tracking

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Business analytics with charts and metrics for operations performance

features.name: Management
features.description: Staff, hub, and organization management (ADMIN only)

features.name: PrintLabel
features.description: Shipping label generation and printing with barcode

features.name: Notifications
features.description: User notification system for alerts and updates

features.name: ShiftReport
features.description: Shift-based operational reporting for warehouse staff

features.name: AuditService
features.description: Audit logging for critical operations and compliance

features.name: ErrorHandling
features.description: Centralized error handling with Sentry integration and user-friendly error messages
